name: Space Assassin
overview: A vertically scrolling space shooter made with SEUCK and created by David Carter. Fly over enemy bases along the pipes\corridors there are enemy fire centers which emit shots in continuous sequence and in all directions, with trajectories that include diagonal. Avoid the shots, blow up as many foes as possible. Game can be played by 2 simultaneous players, but new solutions bring new problems and they sometimes come in continuous succession. Good luck! Published in Italy as Space Trooper in Logica 2000 n.89 (1989).
